body_content.explanation: extremely conservative (= not usually liking or trusting change, especially sudden change):
examples: She was criticized for her ultra-conservative views against homosexuals and abortion.
Longtime members of the organization are ultra-conservative and bound by tradition and don't want to see any major changes.

body_content.explanation: very traditional and not at all fashionable or modern in appearance:
examples: In recent years, the company has been transformed from a producer of ultra-conservative clothes to an upscale designer label.
The ultraconservative dresser will love these traditional shirts.
